The FIDO UAF Test Plan defines the testing procedures to assess the conformity of FIDO components to the FIDO UAF specification set. This test plan is the basis for the implementaton of a test harness allowing developers to easily test for FIDO conformity. When specification and test plan are comprehensive and unambiguous, then conformity leads to interoperability.

Notation

Type names, attribute names and element names are written as code.

String literals are enclosed in “”, e.g. “UAF-TLV”.

In formulas we use “|” to denote byte wise concatenation operations.

With respect to JSON encoded fields and values:

  • With missing we mean that the field is not present, e.g. in the JSON object "{ }" the field "op" is missing.
  • With empty we mean a value of zero length (in the case of DOMStrings) or an array with zero elements.
  • With null we mean a value null as defined by [[!JSON]], section 5, e.g. "{ \"appID\": null }". This is different than "{ \"appID\": \"null\" }", which represents the string "null".
  • With invalid we mean a field which has an invalid syntax (e.g. required (sub-)fields are missing; value is an integer (e.g. "{ \"myString\": 2}" as opposed to "{ \"myString\": \"some text\"}") when a string is expected or vice versa; length constraints are not met; etc.

UAF specific terminology used in this document is defined in [[FIDOGlossary]].

Key Words

The key words “MUST”, “MUST NOT”, “REQUIRED”, “SHALL”, “SHALL NOT”, “SHOULD”, “SHOULD NOT”, “RECOMMENDED”, “MAY”, and “OPTIONAL” in this document are to be interpreted as described in [[RFC2119]].

Overview

FIDO UAF Test Cases

This test plan relates to the FIDO UAF v1.3 specification set.

The test plan will be presented in tabular form. Conditions and constraints that must be tested will be described in easily readable format. When all conditions and constraints are met then the test step is successfully passed. When all the test steps are passed then the test case is passed (result = PASS), otherwise the test case fails (result = FAIL) or (result= WARNING).

This test plan relates to the following specifications:

  • [[!UAFProtocol]]
  • [[!UAFAuthnrCommands]]
  • [[!UAFRegistry]]
  • [[!FIDORegistry]]
  • [[!FIDOMetadataStatement]]

Tests related to the Registration Operation

Test the Registration Request Message

Test case name Reg-Req-1
Protocol Reference [[!UAFProtocol]] Section 3.4.1 Registration Request Message
Test purpose Test the Registration Request Message (which is an array of dictionaries), for a specific protocol version
Data object to be tested Registration Request Message
Additional Input None
Test Step No. Field of Data Object Spec. Reference Conditions / Constraints Instructions for Test Operator
P-1 Array of dictionary (Registration Request Message) Section 3.4.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] The array MUST not contain two dictionaries of the same protocol version Non-conformant if test fails
Negative Tests
Test Step No. Field of Data Object Spec. Reference Conditions / Constraints Instructions for Test Operator
F-1 array Section 3.4.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] If more than one dictionaries of the same protocol are present Non-conformant if test passes

Test the RegistrationRequest dictionary in the UAF Registration Request Message

Test case name Reg-Req-2
Protocol Refrence 3.4.2 RegistrationRequest dictionary
Test purpose Test the RegistrationRequest dictionary
Data object to be tested RegistrationRequest dictionary
Additional Input None
Test Step No. Field of Data Object Spec. Reference Conditions / Constraints Instructions for Test Operator
P-1 header Section 3.4.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] required OperationHeader header, Header.op MUST be "Reg" Non-conformant if test fails
P-2 challenge Section 3.4.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] required ServerChallenge challenge Non-conformant if test fails
P-3 username Section 3.4.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] required DOMString username, length of the username string[1..128] Non-conformant if test fails
P-4 policy Section 3.4.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] required Policy policy Non-conformant if test fails
Negative Tests
Test Step No. Field of Data Object Spec. Reference Conditions / Constraints Instructions for Test Operator
F-1 header Section 3.4.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] header=null/empty/missing Non-conformant if test passes
F-2 header Section 3.4.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] header is invalid Non-conformant if test passes
F-3 challenge Section 3.4.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] challenge=null/missing/empty Non-conformant if test passes
F-4 challenge Section 3.4.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] challenge is invalid Non-conformant if test passes
F-5 username Section 3.4.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] username=null/missing/empty Non-conformant if test passes
F-6 username Section 3.4.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] username is invalid Non-conformant if test passes
F-7 policy Section 3.4.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] policy= null/missing/empty Non-conformant if test passes
F-8 policy Section 3.4.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] policy is invalid Non-conformant if test passes
F-9 header Section 3.4.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] In the header field Header.op= "REG" or "reg" Non-conformant if test passes
F-10 header Section 3.4.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] In the header field Header.op= "Auth" Non-conformant if test passes
F-11 header Section 3.4.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] In the header field Header.op= "Dereg" Non-conformant if test passes
F-12 username Section 3.4.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] Length of username string is greater than 128 bytes Non-conformant if test passes

Test OperationHeader dictionary in the UAF Registration Request Message

Test case name Reg-Req-3
Protocol Reference [[!UAFProtocol]] Section 3.1.3.1 OperationHeader dictionary
Test purpose Test the OperationHeader dictionary
Data object to be Tested OperationHeader
Additional Input None
Test Step No. Field of Data Object Spec. Reference Conditions / Constraints Instructions for Test Operator
P-1 upv (UAF protocol version) Section 3.1.3.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] required Version upv, major version with value = 1, minor version with value = 3 Non-conformant if test fails
P-2 op Section 3.1.3.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] required Operation op, value of op = "Reg" Non-conformant if test fails
P-3 appID Section 3.1.3.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] DOMString appID, length of appID string[0..512]. If appID is missing or empty the appID= FacetID, MUST be an HTTPS URI, appID MUST be used by FIDO client for determining UAuth.Key usage Non-conformant if test fails
P-4 serverData Section 3.1.3.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] DOMString serverData, length of serverData string[1..1536]. Field can be missing (i.e. not present) Provide warning if test fails
P-5 exts Section 3.1.3.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] Extension[] exts, field can be missing (i.e. not present) Not a mandatory field
Negative Tests
Test Step No. Field of Data Object Spec. Reference Conditions / Constraints Instructions for Test Operator
F-1 upv Section 3.1.3.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] upv field is null/missing/empty Non-conformant if test passes
F-2 op Section 3.4.5.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] op field is null/missing/empty Non-conformant if test passes
F-3 upv Section 3.1.3.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] upv field is invalid Non-conformant if test passes
F-4 op Section 3.1.3.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] op field is invalid Non-conformant if test passes
F-5 upv Section 3.1.1.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] major=1 , minor=1 Non-conformant if test passes
F-6 upv Section 3.1.1.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] major=0 , minor=2 Non-conformant if test passes
F-7 upv Section 3.1.1.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] major=1 , minor=null/empty/missing Non-conformant if test passes
F-8 upv Section 3.1.1.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] minor=2 , major=null/empty/missing Non-conformant if test passes
F-9 upv Section 3.1.1.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] minor=null/empty/missing, major=null/empty/missing Non-conformant if test passes
F-10 op Section 3.4.5.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] For registration request value of op= "REG" or "reg" Non-conformant if test passes
F-11 op Section 3.4.5.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] For registration request value of op= "Auth" Non-conformant if test passes
F-12 op Section 3.4.5.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] For registration request value of op= "Dereg" Non-conformant if test passes
F-13 appID Section 3.1.3.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] Length of the field appID is greater than 512 bytes Non-conformant if test passes
F-14 appID Section 3.1.3.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] appID is null (i.e. { ... appID: null}) Non-conformant if test passes
F-15 appID Section 3.1.3.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] appID is an URI with HTTP protocol (not HTTPS) Non-conformant if test passes
F-16 serverData Section 3.1.3.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] Length of serverData is greater than 1536 bytes or if serverData is null. Non-conformant if test passes

Test purpose Test the ServerChallenge
Data object to be tested ServerChallenge
Additional Input The maximum length has been defined such that SHA-512 output can be used without truncation.
Test Step No. Field of Data Object Spec. Reference Conditions / Constraints Instructions for Test Operator
P-1 ServerChallenge Section 3.1.6 [[!UAFProtocol]] typedef DOMString ServerChallenge, ServerChallenge SHOULD be mixed with the entropy pool of the Authenticator, length of the ServerChallenge string= [8-64], base64url encoded Non-conformant if test fails
Negative Tests

F-1 challenge Section 3.1.7.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] challenge is NOT base64url encoded Non-conformant if test passes

F-3 challenge Section 3.1.7.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] Length of the challenge is less than 8 bytes Non-conformant if test passes

Test the policy dictionary in the UAF Registration Request Message

Test case name Reg-Req-5
Protocol Reference [[!UAFProtocol]] Section 3.1.12 Policy dictionary
Test purpose Test the policy dictionary containing the specification of accepted and disallowed Authenticators
Data object to be tested Policy
Additional Input None
Test Step No. Field of Data Object Spec. Reference Conditions / Constraints Instructions for Test Operator
P-1 accepted Section 3.1.12.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] Required MatchCriteria[][] accepted, Sub-arrays of MatchCriteria in the second index (i.e. the set) indicate that multiple authenticators (i.e. each set element) MUST be registered/authenticated to be accepted by the server, Servers MUST put their most preferred authenticators first, and FIDO UAF Clients SHOULD present authenticator registration/authentication options to the user in the same order, or only the most preferred authenticator(s). Non-conformant if test fails
P-2 disallowed Section 3.1.12.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] MatchCriteria[] disallowed, authenticator that matches any of MatchCriteria in this field MUST be excluded from eligibility for registration/authentication, regardless of whether it matches any accepted MatchCriteria or not. Not a mandatory field
P-3 MatchCriteria fields aaid may be combined with keyID, attachmentHint, authenticatorVersion and exts. Section 3.4.6.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] MatchCriteria fields aaid may be combined with keyID, attachmentHint, authenticatorVersion and exts but aaid MUST NOT be combined with any other field. Non-conformant, if MatchCriteria.aaid is combined with any other field than keyID, attachmentHint, authenticatorVersion and exts.
P-4 MatchCriteria.authenticatorVersion Section 3.1.11 [[!UAFProtocol]] The field authenticatorVersion is deprecated and should not be used in MatchCriteria sent to the FIDO Client. Give a warning if field is present.
Negative Tests
Test Step No. Field of Data Object Spec. Reference Conditions / Constraints Instructions for Test Operator
F-1 accepted Section 3.1.12.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] accepted=null/missing/empty Non-conformant if test passes. While the FIDO server must not generate a policy.accepted which is empty, the FIDO Client is allowed to accept such and treat it as the "any" policy.
F-2 accepted Section 3.1.12.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] accepted is invalid Non-conformant if test passes
F-3 accepted Section 3.1.12.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] Authenticators not listed according to the highest priority first Non-conformant if test passes
F-4 accepted Section 3.1.12.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] Server accepts the registration request of authenticators not listed in the accepted double array Non-conformant if test passes
F-5 accepted Section 3.1.12.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] Authenticators that matches any of MatchCriteria contained in the field disallowed is eligible/able to register Non-conformant if test passes

Test the FIDO Client for processing Server Policy during Registration

Test case name Reg-Req-6
Protocol Reference [[!UAFProtocol]] Section 3.2 During Registration
Test purpose Test the FIDO UAF Client for processing Server policy during Registration
Data object to be tested server policy
Additional Input None
Test Step No. Field of Data Object Spec. Reference Conditions / Constraints Instructions for Test Operator
P-1 Policy.accepted[][] Section 3.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] Required Policy.accepted[][], list of combinations which are ordered with highest priority first, each combination is a criteria Non-conformant if test fails
P-2 Policy.disallowed[] Section 3.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] Policy.disallowed[] Not a mandatory field
Negative Tests
Test Step No. Field of Data Object Spec. Reference Conditions / Constraints Instructions for Test Operator
F-1 Policy.accepted[][] Section 3.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] Policy.accepted is NOT a double array containing the list of combinations Non-conformant if test passes
F-2 Policy.accepted[][] Section 3.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] Policy.accepted does NOT contain the list ordered with the highest priority first, i.e. Policy.accepted[A,B, C][D,E] where priority of A > B > C > D > E Non-conformant if test passes
F-3 Policy.accepted[][] Section 3.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] If Policy.accepted[A, B, C][D, E]and FIDO UAF Client does NOT follow priority of A > B > C > D > E for registration Non-conformant if test passes
F-4 Policy.disalllowed[] Section 3.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] The FIDO UAF Client considers the authenticators specified in the Policy.disallowed[] for registration Non-conformant if test passes
F-5 Policy.accepted[][], Policy.disallowed[] Section 3.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] If Policy.accepted[A, B, C][D, E, F, G] and Policy.disallowed[F, G] then the FIDO UAF Client considers authenticators F & G for registration Non-conformant if test passes

Test the Registration Request Generation Rules for the FIDO UAF Server

Test case name Reg-Req-7
Protocol Reference [[!UAFProtocol]] Section 3.4.6.1 Registration Request Generation Rules for FIDO UAF Server
Test purpose Test the Registration Request Generation Rules for FIDO UAF Server
Data object to be tested authentication policy p, MatchCriteria m[], RegistrationRequest r
Additional Input None
Test Step No. Field of Data Object Spec. Reference Conditions / Constraints Instructions for Test Operator
P-1 p.allowed when m.aaid is provided Section 3.4.6.1.1.1.1.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] Allowed combinations (m.aaid , m.keyID), (m.aaid, m.attchmentHint), (m.aaid, m.exts) Non-conformant if test fails
P-2 p.allowed when m.aaid is not provided Section 3.4.6.1.1.1.1.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] m.authenticationAlgorithms & m.assertionSchemes MUST be provided Non-conformant if test fails
P-3 p.disallowed for already registered AAID Section 3.4.6.1.1.2.1.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] Add AAID & KeyID to m.aaid & m.KeyID respectively, Server MUST include already registered authenticators AAID & KeyID in p.disallowed Non-conformant if test fails
P-4 p.disallowed for disallowed authenticators (as provided in [[!FIDOMetadataService]]) Section 3.4.6.1.1.2.2 [[!UAFProtocol]] Add AAIDs of all disallowed authenticators to m.aaid Non-conformant if test fails
P-5 r.header Section 3.4.6.1.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] r.header with major= 1, minor= 2, MAC(r.header.serverData) Non-conformant if test fails
Negative Tests
Test Step No. Field of Data Object Spec. Reference Conditions / Constraints Instructions for Test Operator
F-1 p.allowed when m.aaid is not provided Section 3.4.6.1.1.1.1.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] m.authenticationAlgorithms is NOT provided Non-conformant if test passes
F-2 p.allowed when m.aaid is not provided Section 3.4.6.1.1.1.1.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] m.assertionSchemes is NOT provided Non-conformant if test passes
F-3 already registered Authenticators Section 3.4.6.1.1.2.1.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] If AAID of already registered authenticator is not added to m.aaid Non-conformant if test passes
F-4 already registered Authenticators Section 3.4.6.1.1.2.1.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] If KeyID of already registered authenticator is not added to m.KeyID Non-conformant if test passes
F-5 p.disallowed for already registered Authenticators Section 3.4.6.1.1.2.1.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] If AAID of already registered authenticator is not added to p.disallowed Non-conformant if test passes
F-6 p.disallowed for already registered Authenticators Section 3.4.6.1.1.2.1.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] If KeyID of already registered authenticator is not added to p.disallowed Non-conformant if test passes
F-7 p.disallowed for disallowed authenticators (as provided in [[!FIDOMetadataService]]) Section 3.4.6.1.1.2.2 [[!UAFProtocol]] If AAIDs of all disallowed authenticators is not added to m.aaid Non-conformant if test passes
F-8 r.header Section 3.4.6.1.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] version with major= 1 and minor= 1 Non-conformant if test passes
F-9 r.header Section 3.4.6.1.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] version with major= 0 and minor= 2 Non-conformant if test passes
F-10 r.header Section 3.4.6.1.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] version with major= null/missing/empty and minor= 2 Non-conformant if test passes
F-11 r.header Section 3.4.6.1.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] version with major= 1 and minor= null/missing/empty Non-conformant if test passes
F-12 r.header Section 3.4.6.1.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] version with major= null/missing/empty and minor= null/missing/empty Non-conformant if test passes

Test the Registration Request Processing Rules for the FIDO UAF Client

Test case name Reg-Req-8
Protocol Reference [[!UAFProtocol]] Section 3.4.6.2 Registration Request Processing Rules for FIDO UAF
Test Purpose Test the Registration Request Processing Rules for FIDO UAF Client
Data object to be tested RegistrationRequest
Additional Input None
Test Step No. Field of Data Object Spec. Reference Conditions / Constraints Instructions for Test Operator
P-1 version Section 3.4.6.2 [[!UAFProtocol]] Choose the message with version major= 1, minor= 2 Non-conformant if test fails
P-2 UAF RegistrationRequest message Section 3.4.6.2 [[!UAFProtocol]] Perform tests specified in (Reg-Req-1, Registration Request Message Section 3.4.1[UAFProtocol] step P-1), ( Reg-req-2, RegistrationRequest dictionary Section 3.4.2.1[UAFProtocol] step P-1 to P-4), ( Reg-Req-3, OperationHeader dictionary Section 3.1.3.1[UAFProtocol] step P-1 to P-5), (Reg-Req-4, ServerChallenge field Section 3.1.6 [[!UAFProtocol]] step P-1), (Reg-Req-5, policy dictionary Section 3.1.12.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] step P-1 and P-2) on the RegistrationRequest message Non-conformant if test fails
P-3 RegRequest.policy. disallowed[].keyIDS Section 3.4.6.2 [[!UAFProtocol]] Authenticators SHOULD not be presented to the user which are specified in RegRequest.policy.disallowed[].keyIDs Non-conformant if test fails
P-4 FacetID Section 3.4.6.2 [[!UAFProtocol]] If AppID is missing or empty then set AppID=FacetID and do not load trusted facets file. Non-conformant if test fails
P-5 fcp Section 3.4.6.2 [[!UAFProtocol]] Dictionary FinalChallengeParams, serialize UTF-8 , baser64url encoded, perform tests specified in(Reg-Resp-4, FinalChallengeParams dictionary Section 3.1.7.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] step P-1 to P-4 ] Non-conformant if test fails
P-6 N/A Section 3.4.6.2 and 3.1.3.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] Provide valid registration request with OperationHeader.AppID set to empty string (i.e. ""). Non-conformant if FIDO Client loads the (or a) trusted facets file.
P-7 N/A Section 3.4.6.2 and 3.1.3.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] Provide valid registration request with missing OperationHeader.AppID. Non-conformant if FIDO Client loads the (or a) trusted facets file.
Negative Tests
Test Step No. Field of Data Object Spec. Reference Conditions / Constraints Instructions for Test Operator
F-1 header, challenge, username, policy in the UAF RegistrationRequest message Section 3.4.6.2 [[!UAFProtocol]] Perform negative tests specified in (Reg-Req-1, Registration Request Message Section 3.4.1[UAFProtocol] step F-1), (Reg-Req-2, RegistrationRequest dictionary Section 3.4.2.1[UAFProtocol] step F-1 to F-12), (Reg-Req-3, OperationHeader dictionary Section 3.1.3.1[UAFProtocol] step F-1 to F-16), (Reg-Req-4, ServerChallenge field Section 3.1.7.1[UAFProtocol] step F-1 to F-3), (Reg-Req-5, policy dictionary Section 3.1.12.1[UAFProtocol] step F-1 (only for null and missing - not for empty!) to F-5) and Client does not reject the operation Non-conformant of it passes. While the FIDO server must not generate a policy.accepted which is empty, the FIDO Client is allowed to accept such and treat it as the "any" policy.
F-2 RegRequest.policy. disallowed[].keyIDs Section 3.4.6.2 [[!UAFProtocol]] Authenticator specified in the RegRequest.policy.disallowed[]. keyIDs are presented again for registration Non-conformant of it passes
F-3 AppID Section 3.4.6.2 [[!UAFProtocol]] For missing or empty AppID, AppID is NOT equal FacetID Non-conformant of it passes
F-4 FacetID Section 3.4.6.2 [[!UAFProtocol]] FacetID is not authorized for AppID according to the algorithms specified in [FIDOAppIDAndFacets] Non-conformant of it passes
F-5 fcParams Section 3.4.6.2 [[!UAFProtocol]] fcParams=null/missing/empty Non-conformant of it passes
F-6 fcParams Section 3.4.6.2 [[!UAFProtocol]] fcParams is invalid Non-conformant of it passes
F-7 fcParams Section 3.4.6.2 [[!UAFProtocol]] fcParams is NOT base64url encoded Non-conformant if test fails
F-8 fcParams Section 3.4.6.2 [[!UAFProtocol]] fcParams is NOT serialized using UTF-8 encoding Non-conformant if test fails
F-9 fcParams Section 3.4.6.2 [[!UAFProtocol]] Perform negative test specified in ( Reg-Resp-4, FinalChallengeParams dictionary Section 3.1.7.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] step F-1 to F-18) for the fcParams dictionary members Non-conformant if test fails

P-3 appID Section 3.1.3.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] DOMString appID, length of appID string[0..512]. If appID is missing or empty the appID= FacetID, MUST be an HTTPS URI, appID MUST be used by FIDO client for determining UAuth.Key usage Non-conformant if test fails

Negative Tests
Test Step No. Field of Data Object Spec. Reference Conditions / Constraints Instructions for Test Operator
F-1 TAG_SIGNATURE Section 5.1.1.2 [[!UAFAuthnrCommands]] Key registered correctly (e.g. according to reg-resp-8 P-1) and TAG_UAFV1_SIGNED_DATA.SignatureAlgAndEncoding = ALG_SIGN_SECP256R1_ECDSA_SHA256_RAW and signature invalidated (e.g. by adding 0x03 to byte number 15 in TAG_SIGNATURE). Non-conformant if test passes, i.e. the FIDO Server does not successfully reject the invalid signature.
F-2 TAG_SIGNATURE Section 5.1.1.2 [[!UAFAuthnrCommands]] Key registered correctly (e.g. according to reg-resp-8 P-2) and TAG_UAFV1_SIGNED_DATA.SignatureAlgAndEncoding = ALG_SIGN_SECP256R1_ECDSA_SHA256_RAW and signature invalidated (e.g. by adding 0x03 to byte number 15 in TAG_SIGNATURE). Non-conformant if test passes, i.e. the FIDO Server does not successfully reject the invalid signature.

Test purpose Test the Deregistration Request Message (which is an array of dictionaries), for a
Data object to be tested Authentication Response Message
Additional Input None
Test Step No. Field of Data Object Spec. Reference Conditions / Constraints Instructions for Test Operator
P-1 Array of dictionary (Authentication Request Message) Section 3.6.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] The array MUST not contain two dictionaries of the same protocol version Non-conformant if test fails
Negative Tests
Test Step No. Field of Data Object Spec. Reference Conditions / Constraints Instructions for Test Operator
F-1 Array of dictionary (Authentication Request Message Section 3.6.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] The array contains two dictionaries of the same protocol version Non-conformant if test passes

Test purpose Test the OperationHeader dictionary
Data object to be Tested OperationHeader
Additional Input None
Test Step No. Field of Data Object Spec. Reference Conditions / Constraints Instructions for Test Operator

P-2 op Section 3.1.3.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] required Operation op, value = "Dereg" Non-conformant if test fails
P-3 appID Section 3.1.3.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] DOMString appID, length of appID string[0..512]. If appID is missing or empty the appID= FacetID, MUST be an HTTPS URI, appID MUST be used by FIDO client for determining UAuth.Key usage Non-conformant if test fails
P-4 serverData Section 3.1.3.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] DOMString serverData, length of serverData string[1..1536]. Field can be missing (i.e. not present) Provide warning if test fails
P-5 exts Section 3.1.3.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] Extension[] exts, field can be missing (i.e. not present) Not a mandatory field
Negative Tests

F-2 op Section 3.1.3.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] For registration request value of op= "DEREG" or "dereg" Non-conformant if test passes

Test the DeregisterAuthenticator dictionary

Test case name Dereg-Req-4
Protocol Reference [[!UAFProtocol]] Section 3.6.2 DeregisterAuthenticator dictionary
Test purpose Test the DeregisterAuthenticator dictionary
Data object to be tested DeregisterAuthenticator
Additional Input None
Test Step No. Field of Data Object Spec. Reference Conditions / Constraints Instructions for Test Operator
P-1 aaid Section 3.6.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] required typedef DOMString AAID. It may be empty if all keys related to the specified appID are to be de-registered. If aaid is not empty, length of the AAID string= [9] . Format of AAID is "4 hex digits of vendor code" # "4 hex digits of model code" i.e. AAID = 4(HEXDIG)"#"4(HEXDIG) . AAID is case insensitive Non-conformant if test fails
P-2 keyID Section 3.6.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] required typedef DOMString KeyID KeyID, base64url encoded. It may be empty if all keys related to the specified appID and aaid are to be de-registered. It MUST NOT be empty if aaid is not empty. If keyID is not empty, length of the KeyID string= [8-64], and (aaid, keyID) tuple MUST map to an Authenticator's registration Non-conformant if test fails
Negative Tests
Test Step No. Field of Data Object Spec. Reference Conditions / Constraints Instructions for Test Operator
F-1 aaid Section 3.6.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] aaid=null/missing Non-conformant if test passes
F-2 aaid Section 3.6.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] aaid is invalid Non-conformant if test passes
F-3 keyID Section 3.6.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] keyID is non-empty and valid, aaid is empty Non-conformant if test passes
F-4 keyID Section 3.6.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] keyID=null/missing, aaid is empty Non-conformant if test passes
F-5 keyID Section 3.6.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] keyID=null/empty/missing, aaid is non-empty and valid Non-conformant if test passes
F-6 keyID Section 3.6.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] keyID is invalid Non-conformant if test passes
F-7 keyID Section 3.6.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] keyID is not unique, aaid is not empty Non-conformant if test passes
F-8 aaid Section 3.6.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] Length of aaid is greater than 9 bytes Non-conformant if test passes
F-9 aaid Section 3.6.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] aaid string does NOT have a format "V#M" where , V= Authenticator Vendor Code of 4 hex digits, M= Authenticator Model Code of 4 hex digits and # is a separator Non-conformant if test passes
F-10 keyID Section 3.6.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] Length of the keyID string is greater than 2048 bytes Non-conformant if test passes
F-11 keyID Section 3.6.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] Length of the keyID string is less than 32 bytes Non-conformant if test passes
F-12 keyID Section 3.6.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] keyID is NOT base64url encoded Non-conformant if test passes
F-13 keyID Section 3.6.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] keyID is base64url encoded with padding Non-conformant if test passes
F-14 keyID, aaid Section 3.6.2.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] keyID and aaid are non-empty, (keyID, aaid) tuple does NOT uniquely map to an Authenticator's registration Non-conformant if test passes

Test the Deregistration Request Generation Rules for the FIDO Server

Test case name Dereg-Req-5
Protocol Reference [[!UAFProtocol]] Section 3.6.4.1 Deregistration Request Generation Rules for FIDO Server
Test purpose Test the deregistration request generation rules for FIDO server
Data object to be tested Deregistration request message= m , Deregister Authenticator object= o
Additional Input None
Test Step No. Field of Data Object Spec. Reference Conditions / Constraints Instructions for Test Operator
P-1 m.header.upv Section 3.6.4.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] major version of m.header.upv = 1, minor version of m.header.upv = 3 Non-conformant if test fails
P-2 o.aaid & o.keyID Section 3.6.4.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] If the FIDO Server intends to deregister all keys on all authenticators, set o.aaid and o.keyID to be empty string values. If the FIDO Server intends to deregister all keys on all authenticators with a given AAID, set o.aaid to the intended AAID and set o.keyID to be an empty string. Otherwise set o.aaid & o.keyID to the values that map to a particular authenticator entry in the FIDO Server's account database Non-conformant if test fails
Negative Tests
F-1 Header Section 3.6.4.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] Perform negative tests specified in (Reg-Req-3, OperationHeader dictionary in the UAF Registration Request Message Section 3.1.3.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] step F-1 to F-9 and step F-13 to F-16)for the Deregistration Request Operation Header Non-conformant if test fails
F-2 o.aaid Section 3.6.4.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] If the FIDO Server intends to deregister all keys on all authenticators with a given AAID, the authenticator entries to be deleted in FIDO Server's account database is NOT mapped correspondingly by the o.aaid Non-conformant if test fails
F-3 o.aaid & o.keyID Section 3.6.4.1 [[!UAFProtocol]] If the FIDO Server intends to deregister a particular key with specified (AAID, KeyID) tuple, the authenticator entry to be deleted in FIDO Server's account database is NOT mapped correspondingly by the o.aaid & o.keyID Non-conformant if test fails

Tests related to the Metadata

Test the Authenticator Metadata Statement

Test case name Metadata-Stmt-1
Protocol Reference [[!FIDOMetadataStatement]] Section 4.1 Metadata Statement
Test purpose Verify compliance of metadata statement fields.
Data object to be tested MetadataStatement
Additional Input None
Test Step No. Field of Data Object Spec. Reference Conditions / Constraints Instructions for Test Operator
P-1 aaid [[!FIDOMetadataStatement]] Section 4.1 of type AAID. MUST be present if field protocolFamily is missing or if it is set to "uaf". Non-conformant if test fails
P-2 description [[!FIDOMetadataStatement]] Section 4.1 required, of type DOMString Non-conformant if test fails
P-3 authenticatorVersion [[!FIDOMetadataStatement]] Section 4.1 required, of type unsigned short Non-conformant if test fails
P-4 upv [[!FIDOMetadataStatement]] Section 4.1 required, of type Version, must be { "major": 1, "minor": 3 }. Non-conformant if test fails
P-5 assertionScheme [[!FIDOMetadataStatement]] Section 4.1 required, of type DOMString, must be "UAFV1TLV" at this time. Non-conformant if test fails
P-6 authenticationAlgorithm [[!FIDOMetadataStatement]] Section 4.1 required, of type unsigned short, must be one of the ALG constants defined in Registry of Predefined Values [[!UAFRegistry]]. Must not be zero. Non-conformant if test fails
P-7 publicKeyAlgAndEncoding [[!FIDOMetadataStatement]] Section 4.1 required, of type unsigned short, must be one of the ALG_KEY constants defined in Registry of Predefined Values [[!FIDORegistry]]. Must not be zero. Non-conformant if test fails
P-8 attestationTypes [[!FIDOMetadataStatement]] Section 4.1 required, of type unsigned short[], each list entry must be one of the TAG_ATTESTATION constants defined in Registry of Predefined Values [[!UAFRegistry]]. Must not be an empty list. Non-conformant if test fails
P-9 userVerificationDetails [[!FIDOMetadataStatement]] Section 4.1 required, of type VerificationMethodANDCombinations[]. Must not be an empty list. Non-conformant if test fails
P-10 keyProtection [[!FIDOMetadataStatement]] Section 4.1 required, of type unsigned short. Must be a 16-bit number representing the bit fields defined by the KEY_PROTECTION constants in the FIDO Registry of Predefined Values [[!FIDORegistry]]. Must not be zero. Bitflag 0x01 cannot be combined with 0x02 and also not with 0x04 and 0x08. Bitflag 0x02 cannot be combined with 0x01. Bitflag 0x04 should be combined with 0x02, but cannot be combined with 0x01 and also not with 0x08. Bitflag 0x08 should be combined with 0x02, but cannot be combined with 0x01 and also not with 0x04. Bitflag 0x10 MUST be set if the key handle needs to be stored at the RP, i.e. if TAG_KEYHANDLE is present in the object TAG_UAFV1_REGISTER_CMD_RESPONSE see [[!UAFAuthnrCommands]]. Non-conformant if test fails
P-10 matcherProtection [[!FIDOMetadataStatement]] Section 4.1 required, of type unsigned short. Must be a 16-bit number representing the bit fields defined by the MATCHER_PROTECTION constants in the FIDO Registry of Predefined Values [[!FIDORegistry]]. Must not be zero. Non-conformant if test fails
P-11 attachmentHint [[!FIDOMetadataStatement]] Section 4.1 required, of type unsigned long. Must be a 32-bit number representing the bit fields defined by the ATTACHMENT_HINT constants in the FIDO Registry of Predefined Values [[!FIDORegistry]]. Must not be zero. Non-conformant if test fails
P-12 isSecondFactorOnly [[!FIDOMetadataStatement]] Section 4.1 required, of type boolean. Non-conformant if test fails
P-13 tcDisplay [[!FIDOMetadataStatement]] Section 4.1 required, of type unsigned short. Must be a 16-bit number representing the bit fields defined by the TRANSACTION_CONFIRMATION_DISPLAY constants in the FIDO Registry of Predefined Values [[!FIDORegistry]]. Must be zero if transaction confirmation is not supported by the authenticator. Non-conformant if test fails
P-14 tcDisplayContentType [[!FIDOMetadataStatement]] Section 4.1 Of type DOMString. Supported MIME content type [[!RFC2049]] for the transaction confirmation display, such as text/plain or image/png. Must be present if tcDisplay is non-zero. Non-conformant if test fails
P-15 tcDisplayPNGCharacteristics [[!FIDOMetadataStatement]] Section 4.1 Of type DisplayPNGCharacteristicsDescriptor[]. Must be present and non-empty if tcDisplay is non-zero and tcDisplayContentType is image/png. Non-conformant if test fails
P-16 attestationRootCertificates [[!FIDOMetadataStatement]] Section 4.1 Of type DOMString[]. Must be present and non-empty if attestationTypes contains other values than TAG_ATTESTATION_BASIC_SURROGATE. Each entry must be a Base64-encoded (section 4 of [[RFC4648]]), DER-encoded [[ITU-X690-2008]] PKIX certificate value. Non-conformant if test fails
P-17 ecdaaTrustAnchor [[!FIDOMetadataStatement]] Section 4.1 Of type EcdaaTrustAnchor[]. This entry MUST be present if and only if attestationType includes TAG_ATTESTATION_ECDAA. Non-conformant if test fails
P-18 icon [[!FIDOMetadataStatement]] Section 4.1 required, of type DOMString. Must contain A data: url [[RFC2397]] encoded PNG [[PNG]] icon. Must be present and non-empty. Non-conformant if test fails
P-19 protocolFamily [[!FIDOMetadataStatement]] Section 4.1 of type DOMString. MAY be present. Allowed values are "uaf", "u2f" or "fido2". Non-conformant if test fails
P-20 aaidguid [[!FIDOMetadataStatement]] Section 4.1 of type AAGUID. MUST be present if field protocolFamily is set to "fido2". Non-conformant if test fails
P-21 attestationRootKeyIdentifiers [[!FIDOMetadataStatement]] Section 4.1 of type DOMString, containing a hex-string. MUST be present if field protocolFamily is set to "u2f". Non-conformant if test fails
Negative Tests
Test Step No. Field of Data Object Spec. Reference Conditions / Constraints Instructions for Test Operator
F-1 Non-conformant if test passes
